page.title: 12BAYSTON HILL FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: On a Saturday morning I usually wake up early about 7 o'clock so I can do some drawing.The rest of the family get up at nine when mum has made the breakfast.I go up stairs to get washed and dressed I usually wear jeans.We go into town about eight o'clock my mum gets clothes and then go to the super market .When we get back I go to play with my friend down the road we go up to a wood or go to call for Jesse another friend.Tea is at five o'clock and after tea I do some drawing or play on the computer. Sunday follows the same patternexept we dont go intoo town .In the afternoon Igo and play footballwith the cubs tea is at half five after tea I go out to play and come in.I go to bed at nine.
